sentences.en: Displays summary output. By default, the output is VERBOSE.
sentences.cn: 显示概要输出, 默认的输出是详细的.

sentences.en: For once, his usually verbose wife was content to listen.
sentences.cn: 他那个一贯唠叨的老婆难得一次愿意倾听。

sentences.en: His writing is difficult and often verbose.
sentences.cn: 他的文章很晦涩，而且往往篇幅冗长。

sentences.en: Legal writing is often unclear and verbose.
sentences.cn: 法律文书往往措辞含糊，行文冗长。

sentences.en: Most C ++ programs use succinct expressions rather than more verbose equivalents.
sentences.cn: 大部分的C++程序员更喜欢使用简洁的表达式而非冗长的等效表达式.

sentences.en: Neither of us was what anyone would call verbose.
sentences.cn: 我们俩任谁看来都不是啰嗦的人.

sentences.en: Print verbose messages, not just warnings and errors.
sentences.cn: 显示冗余信息, 不仅仅是警告和错误.

sentences.en: She is really a verbose companion.
sentences.cn: 她真是个唠叨、啰唆的伙伴.

sentences.en: The prose of his official communications was so laboured, pompous and verbose.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的公文矫揉浮华，长篇大论。

sentences.en: The system is setup by default to boot in Verbose mode.
sentences.cn: 该系统是安装在默认开机,在长篇大论模式.

sentences.en: Their requests are verbose in comparison to those of native speakers.
sentences.cn: 与母语人士相较,他们的要求过于冗长.

sentences.en: There was an error writing the verbose logging property.
sentences.cn: 写入“详细日志纪录”属性出错.

sentences.en: Verily this vichyssoise of verbiage veers most verbose.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问我这拉拉杂杂的啰嗦最终变得冗长无比.

sentences.en: Verily, this Vichyssoise of Verbiage Veers most Verbose.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 我这罗嗦的拉拉杂杂最终变得冗长无比.

sentences.en: What he had to say was confused, halting, and verbose.
sentences.cn: 他说的这些话既杂乱无章 、 吞吞吐吐, 又啰里啰嗦.

sentences.en: Yesterday's communiqu é from Pittsburgh was verbose, and notably short on substance.
sentences.cn: 本周来自匹兹堡的公报篇幅冗长, 但明显缺乏实质性内容.

sentences.en: Your report is too long and verbose.
sentences.cn: 你的报告太长太罗嗦了.

words.tran_cn: 以言语表现；冗长；变成动词

trans.tran_en: using or containing too many words
